Notes

First issue with PO Box 20367, Seattle, WA 98102 address on rear cover Comes with a single sided, 11"x11", brown insert sheet. Managed for Jasiri Artist Management. © 2006 Honor Chest Music (ASCAP) ©℗ 2006 Sub Pop Records. Runouts are etched, except for "GOLDEN" which is stamped.
